item.description:
For the record, this is Erin's event, however I am posting it and it is being held at my place.  Try to wrap your head around that one. :-)

This is a last minute game night based on some interest gathered by Erin's post on the message board.  And I am hosting it at my place because my deteriorating health has made me immobile (don't worry I am not contagious or anything).  It is an open game night, so we'll play anything however, I am getting the feeling that it will lean toward lighter board games (rather than hardcore strategy or party games).

For example:

  • Kill Doctor Lucky
  • Blokus
  • Monopoly Deal
  • Wii

So if you can't :-( or aren't going to Unity and find yourself with no plans feel free to unwind with some game playing over here.  Informal, come as you are, bringing snacks is a good idea because I don't have a lot here.

I'm starting with a small group but will increase if there is a lot of interest.

That is all. :-)

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Last Minute Open Game Night in Danvers
